ModMetaData.name: Grenade Fix: Rearmed
ModMetaData.author: Dingo
ModMetaData.description:
(Based on the idea behind A14 mod "Grenade Fix" by TheFlameTouched)
This mod dynamically injects a minimum range to any weapon with an explosive projectile: Grenades, launchers and even items added by mods.*
The minimum range is slightly larger than the weapon's explosion radius, ensuring that pawns won't explode themselves by accident.
*If the weapon already has a safe minimum range (e.g. mortars) it will not be affected.
